post.body: Good morning, Fr.! Thank u 4 all ur prayers! (I used to work at St. Francis Chapel in downtown Providence & I loved it- on SSDI now)
Doctors appt. 2day. Ugh. Need to start getting ready but don't feel like it...
Having a hard time keeping my eyes open right now...
Anyone want to see my Christmas pics? I posted them all to Facebook: http://is.gd/dCA1
Walmart was so packed. I just went to get some eggs. Soooo glad I'm not still working retail. X Mas eve was just the worst. Poor cashiers...
http://twitpic.com/vzda - Do you think I would melt if I go outside?
http://twitpic.com/vzb0 - Just another pic of me being a goof!
http://twitpic.com/vza4 - This is me just trying to be funny.
This year I am pretending XMas is just another day. I feel no XMas spirit, everything has sucked so bad this year. I just wish it was over.
Just got a call from mom, telling me she just brought my dad to the ER. What the hell is going to go wrong next? I hate this year.
It's already Christmas Eve? Whoa this sure snuck up on me, lol! Merry Ho everyone!
Ha ha! Here's one for all you "Twits": A pregnant goldfish is called a twit.
A raisin dropped in a glass of fresh champagne will bounce up and down continually from the bottom of the glass to the top.
p$2 @wellwishes for CharityWater to save lives. What can 2 do http://bit.ly/13xKO You can tweet donate via @tipjoy too
Anyone else catch the Today Show 2day? This was amazing!- Did an angel save girl from dying in hospital? http://is.gd/daUM
Sketch Swap- Draw one to see one: http://is.gd/11Ws
Find your Ecological Footprint: http://is.gd/cQNJ
The year 2008 in photographs: http://is.gd/caeX
Mr. Picasso Head: http://is.gd/X02
I'm under my electric blanket this morning, eating some oatmeal. Brrrrrr.... It's COLD out there! I want to go play in the snow, lol!
